metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3872 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in codecs/on2/dec/SoftVPX.cpp in libstagefright inmediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-09-01, and 7.0 before 2016-09-01 allows attackers togain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 29421675.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
